name: Centered Youtube (HD WIDE) - November 10th 2016
additional_info:
V-2.0 (November 10th 2016)
=Bug Fix 2: Fixed the no video bug. This is most likely due to YouTube changing the code over the years.
----------------------------
V-1.1 (January 29th 2014)
=Bug Fix 1: Html5 videos didn't fit the player. This was caused by YouTube changing the coding.
----------------------------
V-1.0 (January 23rd 2014)
=UPDATE 1: First wide centered YouTube code.
